title: Why are the game modes all the same?

replies.body: I can't speak 100% as to how the game modes are chosen but keep in mind that they do rotate through all the modes based on popularity (how much the modes were actually played when they were active). The [**Rotating Game Mode FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503#h1q6) details a little more about how the mode is picked ahead of time.
